			<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">

											<div ng-message="required">
												Help Category required.
											</div>
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185363" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['name']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
										<input type="text"  maxlength='64' required         name="name" ng-model="model.name" aria-label="Name" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185363' aria-label="name" dib-container-name='helpCategoryGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >
										<label>
											Name*
										</label>
										<div ng-messages="helpCategoryGrid.name.$error">
											<div ng-message="required">
												Name required.
											</div>
											<div ng-message="maxlength">
												At most 64 characters are allowed.
											</div>
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185364" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="parent_category_id" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="number" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['parent_category_id']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="parent_category_id" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
										<input type="number"  name="parent_category_id" ng-model="model.parent_category_id" aria-label="Parent Category" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185364' aria-label="parent_category_id" dib-container-name='helpCategoryGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-number' md-detect-hidden >
										<label>
											Parent Category
										</label>
										<div ng-messages="helpCategoryGrid.parent_category_id.$error">
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185365" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="url" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['url']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="url" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4039&text=help_category' >
										<textarea   required         name="url" ng-model="model.url" aria-label="Url" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185365' aria-label="url" dib-container-name='helpCategoryGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-textarea' md-detect-hidden >
										</textarea>
										<label>
											Url*
										</label>
										<div ng-messages="helpCategoryGrid.url.$error">
											<div ng-message="required">
												Url required.
											</div>
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class='dib-inline-edit-buttons' flex="none" ng-if="row.___editing">
							<md-button ng-click='cancelRow($event,row)' class="md-raised ">
								Cancel 
							</md-button>
							<md-button ng-click='saveRow($event,row)' class="md-raised  md-accent " ng-disabled="!helpCategoryGrid.$valid" >
								Save   
							</md-button>
						</div>
					</ng-form>
				</md-list-item>
			</md-list>
		</md-content>
		<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
			<div flex=20 layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page limit
				</md-button>
				<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
					<md-option ng-value="10">
						10
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="20">
						20
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="50">
						50
					</md-option>
				</md-select>
			</div>
			<div  ng-if="page.count>
				1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
					First 
				</md-button>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
					Prev 
				</md-button>
				<div layout='row'>
					<md-button disabled>
						Page
					</md-button>
					<md-input-container>
						<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
					</md-input-container>
					<md-button disabled>
						of {{ page.count }} 
					</md-button>
				</div>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
					Next 
				</md-button>
				<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
					Last 
				</md-button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
